title: Starlit Beginning
shortText: Like a signal from a distant star, your first message lit up my world. I knew instantly that the universe had shifted.
secretMessage: The stars aligned the moment we said hello.

title: Cosmic Collision
shortText: Even colliding stars create something beautiful. We learned that our gravity is stronger than any storm.
secretMessage: Our bond is stronger than gravity.
quizQuestion: Where did we go on our first proper date?

title: Galaxy Dance
shortText: That night wasn't just a memory; it was a moment frozen in time. The world spun around us, but we were the center of the universe.
secretMessage: I pick you across every multiverse.
